EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification Template upon Applying to be a Partner
EmailTemplate.name: PRM Partner Application Response Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Application Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your interest in Office Depotâ€™s Partner Exchange (ODPEX). The criteria you submitted will be reviewed and the disposition will be determined within 7 days. If you have not received a response in that timeframe, or have any questions, please reach out to channel support: channelsupport@officedepot.com.
Thanks,
Channel Support.
